references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of group equivariant convolutional neural networks, which is a crucial theoretical basis for the current work's approach to SE(3) equivariance.

references.paper_title: Perceiver IO: A general architecture for structured inputs & outputs
references.reason: This is the core architecture upon which the proposed method is based, providing the fundamental framework for handling multi-view data.
This paper directly addresses 3D equivariant transformers, providing relevant architectural insights for adapting the Perceiver IO framework to achieve SE(3) equivariance.

references.paper_title: Depth field networks for generalizable multi-view scene representation
references.reason: This paper is a highly relevant prior work that uses the Perceiver IO architecture for multi-view depth estimation, directly informing the current study's baseline and experimental setup.

This paper establishes a foundation for multi-view equivariant networks, which is directly relevant to the current work's aim of incorporating SE(3) equivariance into a multi-view depth estimation model.
